mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.type, c.title, c.summary, c.cover_url, c.body, c.source_type, c.source_url, c.published_at, c.status, c.created_at, c.updated_at, COALESCE(s.like_count, 0) AS like_count, COALESCE(s.fav_count, 0) AS fav_count, COALESCE(s.down_count, 0) AS down_count, COALESCE(s.comment_count, 0) AS comment_count, COALESCE(s.hot_score, 0) AS hot_score FROM social.content c LEFT JOIN social.content_stats s ON c.id = s.content_id WHERE c.id = #{contentId}::uuid

SELECT r.target_id AS content_id, MAX(CASE WHEN r.reaction_type = 1 THEN true ELSE false END) AS liked, MAX(CASE WHEN r.reaction_type = 2 THEN true ELSE false END) AS favorited, MAX(CASE WHEN r.reaction_type = 3 THEN true ELSE false END) AS downvoted FROM social.reaction r WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}::uuid AND r.target_type = 1 AND r.target_id IN
#{id}::uuid
GROUP BY r.target_id

SELECT c.id, c.type, c.title, c.summary, c.cover_url, c.published_at, c.status, c.created_at, COALESCE(s.like_count, 0) AS like_count, COALESCE(s.fav_count, 0) AS fav_count, COALESCE(s.comment_count, 0) AS comment_count, COALESCE(s.hot_score, 0) AS hot_score FROM social.content c LEFT JOIN social.content_stats s ON c.id = s.content_id WHERE c.status = 1 ORDER BY c.published_at DESC NULLS LAST, c.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
